# documentation
Repository for SeaBee documentation.

If you want to add additional documents please sort them in directories per work package.

If you are making flowcharts I can recommend [mermaid.js](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/). There is a [live editor](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor) that can be used to make diagrams and directly embed them into markdown files. This file is an example of that! In the diagrams so far I have stuck to this legend so if possible, please do the same.:

[![](https://mermaid.)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#)
